name: flickr.groups.discuss.topics.getInfo
description: Get information about a group discussion topic.
authentication: This method does not require authentication.

arguments.name: api_key
arguments.description: Your API application key.See herefor more details.

arguments.name: group_id
arguments.description: NSID or group alias of the group to which the topic belongs. Making this parameter optional for legacy reasons, but it is highly recommended to pass this in to get better performance.

arguments.name: topic_id
arguments.description: The ID for the topic to edit.

response:
<wrapper><?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<rsp stat="ok">
  <topic id="72157607082559966" subject="Who's still around?" author="30134652@N05" authorname="JAMAL'S ACCOUNT" is_pro="0" role="admin" iconserver="0" iconfarm="0" count_replies="1" can_edit="1" can_delete="0" can_reply="0" is_sticky="0" is_locked="0" datecreate="1337975869" datelastpost="1337975921" last_reply="72157607082559968">
    <message>Is anyone still around in this group?</message>
  </topic>
</rsp></wrapper>

errors.title: Topic not foundThe topic_id is invalid
Topic unavailableThe group discussion is unavailable to non-members
Invalid API KeyThe API key passed was not valid or has expired.
Service currently unavailableThe requested service is temporarily unavailable.
Write operation failedThe requested operation failed due to a temporary issue.
Format "xxx" not foundThe requested response format was not found.
Method "xxx" not foundThe requested method was not found.
Invalid SOAP envelopeThe SOAP envelope send in the request could not be parsed.
Invalid XML-RPC Method CallThe XML-RPC request document could not be parsed.
Bad URL foundOne or more arguments contained a URL that has been used for abuse on Flickr.
